name: .VCE File Extension
summary: Learn about .VCE files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: A VCE file is an exam created with Visual CertExam Suite, which includes both Visual CertExam Designer and Visual CertExam Manager. It contains a list of questions and answer possibilities that can be compiled into a certification exam.

content: You can open VCE files in Visual CertExam Suite, which is used for creating and delivering tests for IT certification. The Visual CertExam Designer tool allows you to create and edit exams and Visual CertExam Manager enables you to take the exams.
NOTE: You can also upload VCE files to VCEConvert.com and convert them to .PDF files using the VCE to PDF online conversion tool.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
